resources.string: Click next to see your workout recommendation.
Click next to see your spike recommendation.
5x All out 60m Sprints with 30sec rest. 100m Ladder starting at 10m. 2 broken 400m (4x100m and 2x100m, 1x200m) 5-min rest in between each broken 400m.
4x Broken 400m (2x200m) 5-min rest in between each broken 400m, 3x 500m tempo followed by 3x100m.
4x Mile repeats at 5k pace. 2x800m tempo pace on track. 2 mile cool down run.

Trackster\'s goal is to provide young athletes with the information they need tailored to their event in order to ensure success in track. Trackster\'s data should not be used as a definite answer and should only be considered as a suggestion.
